home.title: Polimaks control center
home.subtitle: Keep warehouse stock and shop floor tasks in one clean dashboard.

inventoryCard.title: Warehouse flows
inventoryCard.body: Materials, waste, and finished goods in one place.

machinesCard.title: Machine room
machinesCard.body: Track printing, cutting, and lamination tasks.

home.cta: Pick a section from the sidebar to get started.

brigadaPage.title: Brigades / groups
brigadaPage.subtitle: Manage shift groups, people, and their leader. Data is local for now (TODO: connect API).
brigadaPage.name: Group name
brigadaPage.leaderHint: Pick someone from the list as the leader.
brigadaPage.deleteHint: You can add it back later.

placeholder.title: Blank workspace
placeholder.description: This screen is ready for your data. Add tables, forms, or charts once the workflow is defined.

inventory.title: Warehouse
inventory.subtitle: Follow materials, waste, and finished products.

plyonka.title: Film rolls
plyonka.description: Film rolls and related stock levels.

plyonkaPage.title: Film rolls
